GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_Receivers

Continuous Built-In Test flags for GNSS receivers information

Bits 104-119 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_Receivers
GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_Receivers() = default
GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_Receivers
explicit GQ7ContinuousBIT_GNSS_Receivers(
const uint16 bits
) : Bitfield(static_cast<uint64>(bits))
Parameters
bits
const uint16

Bits 104-119 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

Bitmasks

Bitmasks for GNSS receivers flags

Note

These masks are shifted 104 bits to the right from the original 128 bitmask to have a 0 index at bit 104

POWER_FAULT_RECEIVER_1

0x0100 - Receiver 1 internal power fault

FAULT_RECEIVER_1

0x0200 - Receiver 1 is inoperable

SHORTED_ANTENNA_1

0x0400 - Antenna 1 is shorted to ground

OPEN_ANTENNA_1

0x0800 - Antenna 1 is open-circuit (or DC block is installed)

SOLUTION_FAULT_RECEIVER_1

0x1000 - Receiver 1 solution is invalid

POWER_FAULT_RECEIVER_2

0x2000 - Receiver 2 internal power fault

FAULT_RECEIVER_2

0x4000 - Receiver 2 is inoperable

SHORTED_ANTENNA_2

0x8000 - Antenna 2 is shorted to ground

OPEN_ANTENNA_2

0x0001 - Antenna 2 is open-circuit (or DC block is installed)

SOLUTION_FAULT_RECEIVER_2

0x0002 - Receiver 2 solution is invalid

RTCM_COMMUNICATION_FAULT

0x0004 - RTCM data was being received previously, but it not currently being received

RTK_DONGLE_FAULT

0x0008 - A problem has been detected with the RTK dongle. Query directly for more detail

flags
uint16 flags() const

Gets the value of the GNSS receivers flags (bits 104-119)

Returns
uint16

Value of the GNSS receivers flags

bool powerFaultReceiver1() const

Gets the value of the GNSS Receiver 1 Power Fault bit (bit 104)

Returns
bool

true: GNSS receiver 1 internal power fault

Gets the value of the GNSS Receiver 1 Fault bit (bit 105)

Returns
bool

true: GNSS receiver 1 is inoperable

bool

true: GNSS antenna 1 is shorted to ground
